channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report X-2024050578
item.description:
Report X-2024050578

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-17T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: HOT SPRINGS
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LOCAL SORT EMPLOYEE NOTICED LARGE BOX OPEN UPON INSPECTION NOTICED CONTENTS WAS A PROPANE TANK. HAZMAT RESPONDER AND ADG AUDITOR SURVEYED THE CONTENTS AND NOTICED A PRESSURE GAUGE. CONTACTED HMSC TO VERIFY UNDECLARED.
